roleset.name: to obliterate, obscure
roleset.note: BLOT_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blot' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from blot.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [She]-1 ran it the length of the South Gardens riverfront , [*trace*]-1 blotting out the city 's great natural water features , the harbor and the river .
example.arg: the city 's great natural water features , the harbor and the river
